name: Potion Panic (Aquanoctis)
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2022 "Roll of the Dice"

Controls:

Click and Drag: Pull dice from the icons on the bottom left. Arrange them into a valid equation and right click the first dice to complete the sum.

A/D: Navigate between potion and a ingredients screen.

Drop dice onto the circular ingredient spaces to return a coloured die of the same value as the input die.

Drop dice onto the circular water bottle space, then right click to add more water to the main potion.

Drop dice onto the main potion to mix the coloured die. Die must be coloured to be added to the main potion.

Increase or decrease the level of the fire by forming a valid equation with the fire at the beginning. Right click the fire to complete the sum.

Right click the witch to get advice on your current potion.
Right click the mini-potion icon to the top-right of the main potion to submit your mixture for judgment.
